prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: A young woman standing full-body in the center of a pure white background, impressionist oil painting style with rich chiaroscuro and visible brushstrokes. She has an ordinary, gentle face with soft features: a rounded jawline, a small nose, and kind, observant hazel eyes that hold a quiet, perceptive light. Her expression is calm and thoughtful, with a faint, introspective smile. Her skin is fair with a warm, peachy undertone, framed by medium-length, wavy chestnut brown hair loosely tied back at the nape of her neck with a simple dark green velvet ribbon, a few stray strands escaping to frame her face.

She is dressed in the modest, elegant fashion of late Victorian London. She wears a high-necked, long-sleeved blouse in a cream-colored cotton with delicate lace at the cuffs and collar, tucked into a long, A-line skirt of muted forest green wool. Over this, she wears a fitted, hip-length jacket in a slightly darker olive green tweed, with subtle herringbone patterning. The outfit is practical yet feminine, suited for movement and observation. Her posture is upright but not rigid, hands clasped gently in front of her, suggesting a patient and attentive nature. The overall atmosphere is serene and poetic, aligning with the game's beautiful, foggy London setting. No text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
